description:
Make DSTAR QSOs via your Windows PC.

With Doozy for Windows you can make QSOâ€™s via your Windows PC on DSTAR ( DPLUS, DEXTRA, DCS and XLX ). There is no need for a hotspot. Just connect your ICOM IC-705 to your Windows PC with an USB datacable and connect it to your favorite DSTAR reflector/repeater.
